does the router know how to route back?: that's why it won't respond to ping it doesn't know how to get back to 192.168.1.0/24

for what you want to do you'll need the wireless clients to use ETH1s ip as their gateway, you need ip forwarding enabled on the linux box, and you need a route on the external router back to 192.168.1.0/24 via eth0s IP
